alert.note: Alert for Coastal Waldo; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Knox; Lincoln (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Kennebec, northwestern Knox, Waldo and northeastern Lincoln Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Thorndike to near Augusta. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Augusta, Belfast, Lincolnville, Searsport, Thorndike, China, Liberty, Palermo, Stockton Springs, Prospect, Winterport, Unity, Knox, Chelsea, Jefferson, Albion, Hope, Appleton, Frankfort and Brooks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Waldo; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Knox; Lincoln
